Articles.Content: I really think they should add the kerbal alarm clock mod to stock... Of course, KSP on PC already has this feature with the latest versions, but I play on console, which is still on 1.10. But yeah, seems like it would be really useful, but unfortunatly the KSP teams have lied to everyone, since they said it would be out by the end of last year, and of course there's been absoulutly nothing. NOt even a delay announcement! or even a cancellation! or litterally any recognition of what they've done wrong! So we're still stuck on 1.10, and we don't have KAC in stock... but it would be nice if we could have that, like everyone else does.

Outer Planets Mod!

We need to give the outer planets some love, right?

Chatterer

Restock (original and plus)

Near and Far future technologies

OPM

any interstellar pack

EVE and Scatterer

Kerbal Engineer Redux

Editor Extensions Redux

Any mod that gives kerbin rings

Any colony pack

Better burn time
We are missing a great VTOL mod for SSTO !
